# CyberArk CTF 2021 - Writeups  - Danger, Will Robinson!

Category: Innovation, Points: 350

![ctf.JPG](images/ctf.JPG)

Attached files: [uhoh.ppm](uhoh.ppm), [uhoh.txt](uhoh.txt).

# Danger, Will Robinson! - Solution

At this challenge we get two files [uhoh.ppm](uhoh.ppm), [uhoh.txt](uhoh.txt).

[uhoh.ppm](uhoh.ppm) file contains the following image:

![uhoh.JPG](images/uhoh.JPG)

And [uhoh.txt](uhoh.txt) contains base64 of this image.

Our target is to "clean" the coffee that spilled on image.

According the challenge description:
>..."This spaceship was very expensive to build, so we **focus** only on our equipment, even before the personals." - a voice from the radio is heard.
>You can hear 50*50 annoying beeps from the equipement - PPPPPP PPPPPP along with some white noises from space...

The first hint is to **focus** only on our equipment and the second one is 50*50 .

If we focus only on the black cubes we get exactly 50*50 pixels:

![50x50.JPG](images/50x50.JPG)

So we need to build an algorithm to clean all coffe from image, We can do it by find all corners and fill black colors between coreners indexes as follow [solve.py](solve.py) (Thanks to [@didi789](https://github.com/didi789)).

The script above will give us the following base64:
```


```

Which is the following image:
![clean.JPG](images/clean.JPG)

Like that we can solve this challenge.
